## ErrorMapFunction type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ErrorMapFunction<T = unknown> = (error: unknown, request: Readonly<{
    jsonrpc: '2.0';
    id?: string | number | null;
    method: string;
    params: readonly unknown[] | object;
}>) => {
    code: number;
    message: string;
    data?: T;
};
```
